en.title: Senior Developer
description: Developed and maintained multiple web applications using Angular and Node.js
Led a team of 5 developers in implementing new features and improving performance
Reduced application load time by 40% through code optimization

en.title: Frontend Developer
description: Built responsive user interfaces using React and TypeScript
Collaborated with designers to implement pixel-perfect UIs
Improved application accessibility to meet WCAG 2.1 standards

es.title: Desarrollador Senior

Reduje el tiempo de carga de la aplicación en un 40% mediante optimización de código

es.title: Desarrollador Frontend
description: Construí interfaces de usuario responsivas usando React y TypeScript
Colaboré con diseñadores para implementar interfaces de usuario perfectas
